text: Hejrenæs is a 1953 Danish film directed by Svend Methling and starring John Wittig, Astrid Villaume and Karin Nellemose.Piil p.221 ==Cast== * John Wittig as Godsejer Hans-Henrik Thann * Astrid Villaume as Vibeke Thann * Karin Nellemose as Tante Sofia * Maria Garland as Tante Hortense * Lisbeth Movin as Ulla Biehle * Ib Schønberg as Godsinspektør Sejersen * Johannes Meyer as Herskabstjener Blackhøj * Knud Rex as Skovfoged Ulf Henningsen * Bendt Rothe as Fabrikant Helge Knudsen * Carl Heger as Dyrlæge * Peter Poulsen as Savværksbestyreren * Jakob Nielsen as Skovarbejder Martin * Emil Hass Christensen == References == == Bibliography == * Morten Piil. Gyldendals danske filmguide. Gyldendal A/S, 2008. == External links == * Category:1953 films Category:Danish films Category:Danish-language films Category:Films directed by Sven Methling
title: Hejrenæs
